requirement.topic: XmlBlaster can suppress to route identical messages in Publish/Subcribe mode

description.p: Setting the QoS flag <forceUpdate/> to false allows to suppress sending a published message to its subscribers when the content of this message didn't change from the former message.
Default is that identical published messages are sent to subscribers again.

requirement.example: <qos> <!-- An update is forced even when the content and meta data didn't change --> <forceUpdate>true</forceUpdate> </qos>
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de
